name: Midnight Towers
description:
Please visit our website for updates and details on all our projects!

Midnight Towers is a 3D Tower Defense game.

Win, Mac, Linux versions availible! 

The current Demo of the game is availible on Web Player at

http://gamejolt.com/games/arcade/midnight-towers/24586/

You earn and spend resource and pek points to upgrade and build your defenses. Waves get larger, and high Waves will start to attack your towers.

Build Support towers for Buffs and to Repair your towers.

Build Resource Towers to help gain more resources.

Current Progress

We have the following presently added and running, GameJolt Trophies, Tutorial Level, Level 1/Demo round, Level 2, Dialogs.

Currently we are working on the final levels, these will include Abiilities that will be usable to help you survive!

This is a product still being developed, so more will be added. Purchasing helps us to keep developments going and to work on other projects! The full version has a Patch noticifaction as well we you can see when a new version is availible.
